name: Showcase Presents "Green Arrow" Quiz | Entertainment | 10 Questions

questions.text: The Red Dart is really a criminal.
questions.explanation:
True.

	The Red Dart threw darts with deadly accuracy, just like Green Arrow slung arrows! It turns out that Red Dart wanted to catch Green Arrow off guard long enough for his gang to rob a bank!

questions.text: When the Green Arrows of the world gather in America, which one is an impostor?
questions.explanation:
The British Green Arrow.

	The real Green Arrow from Britan was knocked out, and a convict took his place, hoping to get revenge on Green Arrow of America! Luckily the situation was defused--literally!

questions.text: When Oliver Queen and Roy Harper were revealed as Green Arrow and Speedy, the whole thing was a hoax.
questions.explanation:
True.

	As part of his initiation into a elite club, a faux headline was put into the local newspaper revealing Oliver Queen as Green Arrow. Using some trick arrows, Queen was able to protect his alter ego.

questions.text: What was the name of the shaman of the tribe of Native Americans that Green Arrow encounters>
questions.explanation:
Big Turtle.

	Big Turtle was intentionally keeping his tribe from modernizing themselves until Green Arrow pulled the wool from over their eyes. Big Turtle then went into hiding.

questions.text: Green Arrow was captured by a group of Germans who were still fighting World War II.
questions.explanation:
False.

	It was a group of Japanese soldiers who refused to believe that World War II was over, not a group of German soldiers! Green Arrow was able to show them incontrovertible proof of the war's end.

questions.text: Who helps a younger Oliver Queen become interested in archery?
questions.explanation:
Superboy.

	Superboy, using a fantastic machine, gazes into to future and learns that Oliver Queen and Green Arrow are one and the same. When a young Queen becomes Superboy's neighbor, the young Kryptonian is determined to put a bow in the boy's hands.

questions.text: The boy that Green Arrow trained was from Alaska.
questions.explanation:
True.

	In training to be the Green Arrow from Alaska, the black-haired boy was thought to be a replacement for Speedy, otherwise known as Roy Harper.

questions.text: Roy Harper, alias Speedy, hires himself out on odd jobs to earn money for a car.
questions.explanation:
False.

	He hopes to earn money for a sailing boat, not a car! By placing an ad in the paper, Speedy finds enough jobs to last him a lifetime.

questions.text: Green Arrow unknowingly trains a criminal in the ways of archery! What does this rascal assume as his supervillainous alter ego?
questions.explanation:
The Crimson Arrow.

	Posing as a well-meaning millionaire, the criminal, who stole every dollar of his fortune, hires Green Arrow to teach him archery. He then uses his own trick arrows to steal from everyone!

questions.text: While at the circus, Green Arrow meets a farcical version of himself named:
questions.explanation:
The Green Error.

	The Green Error is a fumbling clown with his own unpredictable trick arrows. Luckily, they're still good enough to capture some criminals that encounter Green Arrow and his young sidekick Speedy! Strangely, a similar character is used in a later story, this time known as Funny Arrow.
